column1: The Pelicans are 4-1 with Willy Hernangomez in the rotation and have won 4 straight.
[Highlight] Willy Hernangomez rejects Bam Adebayo for his third block of the game!
[Charania] Free agent center Willy Hernangomez has agreed to a three-year deal to stay with the New Orleans Pelicans, agents Jim Tanner and Guillermo Bermejo of @_tandemse tell @TheAthletic @Stadium.
[Highlight] Willy Hernangomez again blocks Damian Lillard!
